attributes.action: Abolish the closed season on rivers in England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no suported evidence that the three month closed season in this country has any proven benefits. In fact it is more likely to be harmful because anglers are 'the eyes and ears'of the countryside and very often are the first people to raise the alarm due to polution etc.Their three month absence is out of date and pointless.
